name: Mygame
description:
STORY

Game is about a person who is stranded on an island whose only inhabitants are Cannibals and mutated Boars.Game takes place in deep forest where one part is safe the other is filled with cannibals and boars.You have six type of weapons some of which you found on the island.A hatchet,revolver,shotgun,nailgun,spear and makeshift bow.You found spear,bow and the hatchet while exploring the island,But on your way back to the safe zone you realise cannibals and boars has picked up your scent.

OBJECTIVE

Your objective is surviving through the enemy zone by any means and reach the safe destination to clear the game.you have 100 health and stamina,while stamina regenerates health however does not so you have to carefully fight the enemies.The safe zone is straight ahead between two rocks and a tree.I have ıncluded ıts spot ın the screenshots.

GAMEPLAY

W-This button will make player to go forwards

S- This button will make player to go backwars

A- This button will make player to go left side

D- This button will make player to go right side

SHIFT- This button will make player to sprint

C- This button will make player to go stealth mode

SPACE- This button will make player to jump over obstacles

MOUSE 1- This button will make player to fire their equipped weapon at the pointed direction

MOUSE 2- This button will make player to aim

ESC- This button will make the game pause so you can acces the pause menu,while in pause menu you can select to resume,quit or going back to the main menu
